column5: In reference to the DWI posts... I could be fishing border waters this year ( Niagara River , Thousand Islands ) can I still purchase a nonresident Ontario fishing license legally if I have a DWI conviction in less than 5 yrs. I am not trying to get away with something but just want to know the rules
I'm pretty sure you won't run into any problems with the license. You might want to buy one online as you may have trouble entering the country with a DWI that recently.
